bpp/descriptor.name: OOGASHOP
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Free GST Billing , Inventory Management and ONDC store for your shop. Works on any device. Contact +917388974291 to bring your shop on ONDC.

descriptor.name: SPRIAL BINDING
descriptor.long_desc: Classmate presents Pulse Unruled notebooks which are made to the highest quality standards. The pages are whiter, brighter and smoother. The notebook is divided into 6 parts and comes in a spiral binding to facilitate the user. The superior cut and excellent finish ensure the pages are in perfect alignment without any folded corners. The superior binding strength and wrapper lamination make them as durable as ever. These notebooks come with a wide variety of covers with activities and trivia to make every classmate's notebook unique in its own way.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: M/s. Dinakar Process Pvt. Ltd. Plot no. B5, Industrial Estate, Auto Nagar, Vijayawada, Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh

descriptor.name: NOTEBOOK
descriptor.long_desc: Classmate Notebooks are made to the highest quality standards. Made from superior quality paper and pulp, the pages are whiter, brighter and smoother. The superior cut and excellent finish ensure the pages are in perfect alignment without any folded corners. The superior binding strength and wrapper lamination make them as durable as ever. These notebooks come with a wide variety of covers with activities and trivias to make every classmate notebook unique in its own way.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Ghaziabad WH, M/s. ITC Limited -ESPB, WSP Bhawani Drug Distributors, C/o Dev Tara Industries, Delhi Meerut Road, Opp. Village Sainthly , Muradnagar, Distt- Ghaziabad ( U.P.), Pin Code - 201206

descriptor.name: Printing Sheets
descriptor.long_desc: Century Copier Paper is a multipurpose paper that can be used in any photocopying system. This paper has a thickness of 70 GSM that has an A4 size. It provides crisp sharp texts with improved contrast and rich, bright images and graphics. They are high-quality organic papers that offer consistent smoothness and performance to ensure that each print is achieved with the same effort.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Decent Plastics, 37/ 84, Nawada Industrial Area, Uttam Nagar, New Delhi - 110059
